content.heroIntro: GOLDEN GREEN represents a prestigious new development in the heart of Serena Golf, Los Alcazares, brought to you by the renowned developer GRUPO VERMELL. This exclusive collection of 8 meticulously designed properties combines contemporary architecture with Mediterranean elegance, offering penthouses, villas, and apartments from €269,900. Each residence features 2-3 spacious bedrooms, modern bathrooms, and built sizes ranging from 72 to 224 square meters on generous plots up to 263 square meters. Located in an established international community where English is widely spoken, GOLDEN GREEN provides the perfect balance of cosmopolitan living and authentic Spanish charm. With completion scheduled for August 1, 2027, this is an exceptional opportunity to secure your dream home in one of Spain's most sought-after golf communities, offering 40% better value than comparable properties on Spanish islands.

With English widely spoken throughout the community and robust expat networks, settling here feels welcoming and familiar for international buyers seeking their Spanish home.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign nationals can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. You do not require a visa specifically for property purchase. Our team can guide you through the legal process and recommend experienced English-speaking notaries and property lawyers to assist with your purchase.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Typical purchase costs include: IVA (VAT) at 10%, property transfer tax (varies by region, approximately 7-8%), notary fees (0.3-0.5%), and legal fees (0.5-1.5% typically). Our advisors provide comprehensive cost breakdowns for GOLDEN GREEN purchases before you commit.
